skill_claims: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality
Generate creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics
Implement real working code with exceptional attention to aesthetic details
Choose bold aesthetic directions with intentional design choices
Create visually striking and memorable interfaces
Use distinctive typography choices beyond generic fonts
Implement cohesive color schemes and themes with CSS variables
Add animations and micro-interactions for enhanced user experience
Create unexpected layouts with asymmetry and creative spatial composition
Add atmospheric backgrounds and visual details like gradients, textures, and effects

tasks.prompt: I need a simple landing page for my coffee shop called 'Brew & Bean'. Just something clean with our hours and contact info.
tasks.tests_claim: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality

tasks.prompt: Can you build me a contact form component for my portfolio website? I'm a graphic designer so it should look professional.
tasks.tests_claim: Generate creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics

tasks.prompt: I want to create a simple pricing table for my SaaS product with three tiers. Make it look modern and trustworthy.
tasks.tests_claim: Use distinctive typography choices beyond generic fonts

tasks.prompt: Build me a dashboard for my fitness app that shows workout stats, progress charts, and upcoming sessions. The target audience is young professionals who care about aesthetics.
tasks.tests_claim: Create visually striking and memorable interfaces

tasks.prompt: I'm launching a luxury watch brand and need a product showcase page. It should feel premium and sophisticated, highlighting our craftsmanship.
tasks.tests_claim: Choose bold aesthetic directions with intentional design choices

tasks.prompt: Create a music player interface for my indie music streaming app. The vibe should be artistic and unconventional, appealing to creative types.
tasks.tests_claim: Add animations and micro-interactions for enhanced user experience

tasks.prompt: I need a complete e-commerce homepage for my avant-garde fashion brand. We're targeting fashion-forward millennials who appreciate bold, experimental design. Include hero section, featured products, and newsletter signup.
tasks.tests_claim: Create unexpected layouts with asymmetry and creative spatial composition

tasks.prompt: Build a portfolio website for a contemporary artist who works with digital installations. The site should be immersive and experimental, breaking conventional web design rules while remaining functional.
tasks.tests_claim: Add atmospheric backgrounds and visual details like gradients, textures, and effects

tasks.prompt: Create a data visualization dashboard for a cryptocurrency trading platform. It needs to handle real-time data display, multiple chart types, and appeal to both novice and expert traders. The design should feel cutting-edge and trustworthy.
tasks.tests_claim: Implement real working code with exceptional attention to aesthetic details

quality_prompts: Design a homepage for a boutique hotel in Tokyo. The target audience is design-conscious travelers who appreciate minimalist luxury.
Create a mobile app interface for a meditation app targeting busy professionals. It should feel calming but not boring.
Build a product page for a high-end skincare brand. The aesthetic should convey science-backed luxury and appeal to discerning customers.
Design a booking interface for a co-working space that caters to creative freelancers and startups. Make it feel inspiring and community-focused.
Create a restaurant menu interface for an upscale farm-to-table restaurant. The design should reflect sustainability and artisanal quality.
